messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui-put-image custom node in ComfyUI?
The purpose of the comfyui-put-image custom node is to load images from a directory into ComfyUI.
What are some of the features of the comfyui-put-image custom node?
The features of the comfyui-put-image custom node include loading images by index, quick inpainting, and quick drawing.
How can you add the comfyui-put-image node in ComfyUI?
To add the comfyui-put-image node in ComfyUI, you need to go to 'Add node > image > Put Image'.
What are the controls available when the focus is on the comfyui-put-image node?

When the focus is on the comfyui-put-image node, the available controls are: Arrow left and right to change index, F5 or Ctrl + r to reload images, - and = to change canvas zoom, mouse wheel scroll to change brush size, and mouse move while wheel click or pressing space bar to move the canvas.
How can you perform masking with the comfyui-put-image node?
To perform masking with the comfyui-put-image node, you can use the mouse left click to add a mask and the mouse right click to remove the mask.
How can you perform painting with the comfyui-put-image node?

To perform painting with the comfyui-put-image node, you can use Ctrl or Alt + Mouse L/R click to change the brush color to the selected pixel, mouse left click for drawing, and mouse right click to remove drawing.
What are the menu items that can be added to 'Save Image' and 'Preview Image' in the comfyui-put-image node?

The menu items that can be added to 'Save Image' and 'Preview Image' in the comfyui-put-image node are: 'Send to input' which copies the selected image to the '/ComfyUI/input' directory, 'Send to output' which copies the selected image to the '/ComfyUI/output' directory, and 'Send to Put Image' which loads the selected image at the specific 'Put Image' node.
